description: Achillea 'Terracotta' - more commonly known as yarrow - is an amazing plant species for any home gardener. Its beautiful terracotta-coloured blooms add an eye-catching splash of colour in any garden, while its natural air freshening properties help naturally deter pests. Plus, its easy to maintain - once established, it's drought-tolerant and loves the sun! Its blooming season is usually mid to late spring, and its pollinator-friendly flowers will attract and sustain wildlife in the garden. A classic, low maintenance plant choice for any garden, Achillea 'Terracotta' is a great addition to any outdoor space.
